amendatorysection.catchline: Volunteer firefighter; file certificate of insurance.
amendatorysection.para: No Nebraska volunteer firefighter shall be dispatched on behalf of this state pursuant to the compact set forth in section 35-201 outside the boundaries of Nebraska unless such volunteer firefighter files with the Nebraska compact administrator a valid certificate of insurance covering him or her for workers' compensation benefits pursuant to the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act outside the boundaries of Nebraska.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act, see section 48-1,110.
